context_of_use: This use case allows users to view and download reports for analysis.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to analyze data offline
user: wants to analyze data offline
admin: wants to monitor business performance
description: Allows users to view sales and other reports and download/export them for offline analysis.
triggering_event: User requests to view or download reports.
preconditions: User has permission to access reports
assumptions: Users have the necessary permissions to view and download reports
Reports are available for viewing and downloading
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to view reports
The system shall allow users to download reports
outstanding_issues: Clarification on report types available for download
main_flow: 1. User requests to view reports → System displays available reports.
2. User selects a report to view → System shows the selected report.
3. User chooses to download the report → System initiates the download process.
4. User receives the downloaded report → System confirms successful download.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If no reports are available, System displays a message indicating no reports are available.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 3): If the download fails, System displays an error message and suggests retrying.
